desc: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by #1[i]%. When the wearer deals Break DMG to an enemy target, inflicts Routed on the enemy, lasting for #4[i] turn(s). Targets afflicted with Routed receive #2[f1]% increased Break DMG from the wearer, and their SPD is lowered by #3[i]%. Effects of the similar type cannot be stacked.
